title.en: The Guy She Was Interested in Wasn't a Guy at All

altTitles.ja: 気になってる人が男じゃなかった

altTitles.ja-ro: Ki ni Natteru Hito ga Otoko Janakatta

altTitles.fr: Le garçon qui l'intéressait n'en était en fait pas un

altTitles.pt-br: O cara que ela estava interessada não era um cara

altTitles.uk: Хлопець, який її цікавив, взагалі не був хлопцем

altTitles.ru: Парень, которым она увлечена, на самом деле не парень

altTitles.az: Onun maraqlandığı oğlan əslində heç oğlan deyilmiş

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ zàiyì de rén bùshì yìxìng

altTitles.id: Pria Yang Dia Suka Ternyata Sama Sekali Bukan Pria

altTitles.th: คนที่เธอปิ๊งความจริงไม่ใช่ผู้ชาย

altTitles.ja-ro: Kininatteru Hito ga Otoko ja Nakatta

description.az: Bu twitter qısa hekayəsi məktəbdən kənarda oğlan kimi səhv saldığı orta məktəbli qızla onun sinif yoldaşı arasındakı sevgi hekayəsini təsvir edir. Nəhayət,qızlar rok musiqisindəki ortaq zövqləri üzərində birləşirlər.
description.en:
Fashionable and upbeat high schooler Aya falls head over heels for an employee at a local CD shop. He’s got an air of mystery about him, always dressed well, and has impeccable taste in music. Little does she know — this supposedly male employee is actually her female classmate Mitsuki!

Mitsuki generally keeps to herself, but since her seat is right next to Aya’s, she can't help but be extremely aware of the other’s crush. Revealing the truth is out of the question — but perhaps getting closer to Aya wouldn’t be so bad...

***Overwhelming winner in the Web category of the 2023 Tsugimanga Awards (by Kadokawa).***
description.fr:
Une histoire très appréciée sur Twitter sur fond de musique de Rock.

Aya, une populaire lycéenne tombe sous le charme du discret vendeur du magasin de musique qu'elle fréquente.

Retour en classe, elle raconte toute l'histoire à ses amies et comment elle a un faible pour ce garçon aux airs de prince charmant.

Ce qu'elle ne sait pas c'est que ce mystérieux vendeur n'est en fait que sa voisine de bureau , Mitsuki, qu'elle a confondu pour un jeune homme.

Comment leur relation va-t-elle évolué ? Arriveront elles à expliquer ce quiproquo ?
description.id:
Series Pendek Twitter yang menggambarkan cerita tentang Gyaru dan Teman Sekelasnya.
Gyaru yang suka musik rock dan sering mendatangi toko kaset jatuh cinta ke pekerja paruh waktu yang bekerja disitu, tapi sedikit dia tahu ternyata pekerjanya itu perempuan dan teman sekelasnya.
description.tr: Süslünün tekinin hoşlandığı çocuk aslında sınıftaki sessiz kız çıkıyor.
description.uk: Популярна серія коротких манґ у твіттері, в якій розповідається про історію кохання між ґяру та її однокласницею, яку вона помилково сприймає як хлопця поза школою, через їхню взаємну любов до рок-музики.
description.pt-br:
Uma Gyaru/Gal que não se parece tanto com suas amigas (Gyarus também) frequenta uma loja de CD's e se apaixona pelo funcionário(?) de meio período do local.
Mas mal sabe ela que o funcionário(?) na realidade é uma menina e é uma das suas colegas de classe.

altTitles.ja: アンネームドメモリー

description.en:
“As long as you’re the master of that sword and I’m a witch, someday you’ll have to kill me for real.”  
  
As a child, Oscar, Crown Prince of Farsas, had been cursed to be childless. At the age of 20, he paid a visit to Tinassha, the strongest witch in the continent, to break the curse. He came back bringing Tinassha along as his protector, and in the one year until his contract with her expired, he got embroiled into her past, and an even greater destiny.
description.es: "Mientras seas el dueño de esa espada y yo una bruja, algún día tendrás que matarme de verdad".    De niño, Óscar, príncipe heredero de Farsas, había sido maldecido a no tener hijos. A los 20 años, visitó a Tinassha, la bruja más fuerte del continente, para romper la maldición. Volvió con Tinassha como protectora, y en el año que le quedaba hasta que expirara su contrato con ella, se vio envuelto en su pasado y en un destino aún mayor.

title.en: Zettai ni Yuuwaku sarenai Otoko VS Zettai ni Yuuwaku suru Onna

altTitles.ja: 絶対に誘惑されない男vs絶対に誘惑する女

altTitles.en: A Man Who Never Be Tempted VS A Girl Who Tempt Perfectly

description.en: Reishi Kiyota, a ronin student, has a phobia of love due to a traumatic experience and has never been with a woman in his life. His neighbor, Aika Toyokawa, an office worker, likes Reishi and tries to seduce him with all her might..!
description.ja:
**「絶対に誘惑してあげるーーだから早く私に堕ちて♡」**

隣に住んでいるお姉さんがある日突然誘惑してきた！？

浪人生の清田玲史はトラウマから恋愛恐怖症を抱え、女性とは縁のない生活を送っていた。
アパートの隣人であるOL・豊川愛香はそんな玲史を気に入り、持ち前のあざとさを駆使しあの手この手で玲史を誘惑していくのだった…！

ちょっぴりえっちな、ほこたてラブコメディ♡

title.en: Tune In to the Midnight Heart

altTitles.ja: 真夜中ハートチューン

altTitles.en: Finding the girl behind the voice.

altTitles.pt-br: Sintonizando com o Coração da Meia Noite
Em busca da garota por trás da voz

description.en:
***"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."***

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people? A cute yet hard-working success romantic comedy begins here!!

---
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10568/episode/347385) (U.S. Only)
description.ja:
***「深夜ひとり、ベッドの上、キミの声だけが救いだった。もう一度キミと話したい。言いたいことがあるんだ」。***

高校2年生の山吹有栖は、「アポロ」という名の、顔も本名も知らないラジオ配信者の少女を探していた。だがある日、有栖は進学先の高校の放送部にアポロの手がかりを得る。そこにいたのは「声に関わる仕事に就く」夢を描く美少女が…4人!!アポロは誰？4人の夢の行方は？かわいくも懸命なサクセスラブコメ、ここに開演!!
description.pt-br: Yamabuki Arisu, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, estava procurando por uma garota chamada “Apollo”, que era locutora de rádio e ele não conhecia seu rosto ou seu nome verdadeiro. No entanto, um dia, Arisu recebe uma pista sobre Apollo do clube de transmissão da escola secundária para a qual ela estava indo. Havia quatro belas garotas que sonhavam em “conseguir um emprego relacionado à voz”!! Quem é Apollo? O que acontecerá com os sonhos dessas quatro pessoas? Uma comédia romântica fofa, mas trabalhadora e de sucesso, começa aqui!!

altTitles.ja: ぷにるはかわいいスライム

description.en: The first unique romantic comedy manga in the history of CoroCoro! The slime he created transformed into a girl!? Kotarou, a young boy, is constantly pushed around by Puniru's freewheeling behavior. It's a fun and exciting daily life!
description.ja: コロコロ史上初、異色のラブコメまんが！！ 自分の作ったスライムが女の子に変身!?　ぷにるの自由気ままな言動に少年・コタローは振り回されっぱなし。毎日愉快なドキドキ生活だ!!

altTitles.ja: クズバンドマンぼっち
ヴィンランド・サガ

description.en:
As a child, Thorfinn sat at the feet of the great Leif Ericson and thrilled to wild tales of a land far to the west. But his youthful fantasies were shattered by a mercenary raid. Raised by the Vikings who murdered his family, Thorfinn became a terrifying warrior, forever seeking to kill the band's leader, Askeladd, and avenge his father. Sustaining Thorfinn through his ordeal are his pride in his family and his dreams of a fertile westward land, a land without war or slavery… the land Leif called Vinland.  

---
- **Won the Japan Media Arts Award Division Grand Prize in 2009**
- **Won the 36th Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2012**
description.ru: Эта история случилась в начале XI века, когда викинги, безраздельно господствовавшие в северных морях, грабили побережья Франции и Англии. В эпоху, где оружие значило больше, нежели слова, маленький мальчик невольно оказывается косвенной причиной гибели своего отца. Повзрослев и став на путь воина, он жаждет честного поединка с убийцей отца – легендарным главарём отряда викингов-наемников, но возраст и отсутствие опыта не позволяют ему сделать это. Чтобы не упускать своего врага из виду, юноша вступает в его отряд и в награду за выполнение тяжелого боевого задания требует поединка с ним, но терпит поражение. Юноша продолжает прилагать все усилия, чтобы осуществить свою месть. Внезапно он оказывается вовлечён в куда более кровавое столкновение…
description.tr: Çocukken Thorfinn, büyük Leif Ericson'un ayaklarının dibinde oturur ve batıdaki uzak diyarların vahşi masallarıyla heyecanlanırdı. Ama gençlik hayalleri bir paralı asker baskınıyla paramparça oldu. Ailesini öldüren Vikingler tarafından yetiştirilen Thorfinn, grubun lideri Askeladd'ı öldürmek ve babasının intikamını almak isteyen korkunç bir savaşçı oldu. Thorfinn'i çileli yaşamı boyunca ayakta tutan, ailesiyle olan gururu ve batıdaki bereketli topraklara, savaşın ve köleliğin olmadığı bir ülkeye, Leif'in Vinland adını verdiği topraklara dair hayalleridir.
description.pt-br: Thorfinn é filho de Thors, um lendário guerreiro viking, mas que após anos no campo de batalha, descobre uma coisa mais maravilhosa que matar seus iguais. Viver sua própria vida, em paz. Mas os ventos lhe trazem uma notícia que atrapalhará seus dias de paz, e Thorfinn, seu filho, pouco sabe desta vida passada de guerra de seu pai. Após descobrir o passado de seu pai, Thorfinn se revolta contra ele, e sai para a guerra junto de seu pai, mas quando reconhece o verdadeiro valor dele, já é tarde demais. Agora Thorfinn deverá seguir sua própria vida, seguindo valores que seu pai lhe ensinou, mas sem perder sua coragem. Este é só o começo desta grande saga de Thorfinn que acompanha os Vikings no século XI!

title.en: Wandering Witch: The Journey of Elaina

altTitles.ja: 魔女の旅々

description.en:
Once upon a time, there was a witch named Elaina, who set off on a journey across the world. Along the way, she would meet all kinds of people, from a country full of witches to a giant in love with his own muscles—but with each meeting, Elaina would become a small part of their story, and her own world would get a little bit bigger.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Akasha as **The Journey of Elaina** (2022)
description.id: Melakukan perjalanan tanpa henti, bertemu berbagai macam orang dari berbagai macam negara, serta mengembara demi memenuhi rasa ingin tahu. Inilah kisah pertemuan dan perpisahan penyihir kelabu Elaina.
description.ja: あるところに一人の魔女がいました。名前はイレイナ。彼女は旅人として、これといった目的もなく、色々な国や人と出逢いながら、流されるように気ままな長い旅を続けています。これは、そんな魔女イレイナが紡ぐ、出逢いと別れの物語…。
description.ru: Много лет странствующая ведьма Элейна находится в пути. Неустанно она путешествует по миру, чтобы повидать разные страны, удивительные обычаи и разносторонние проявления человеческой натуры. Сколько историй она может рассказать как их живой свидетель. Давайте же и мы поспешим составить ей компанию!

description.en:
In this world, there is: Confucianism; Taoism; Buddhism, Demons, and Magicians. Xu Qi’an, a graduate from the police academy, suddenly finds himself waking up in prison, to be exiled to the border three days later …

His initial goal was to protect himself in this world with no laws, and to be able to live a leisurely life as a rich man..

Many years later, Xu Qi’an looks back on the past, and the long-dead enemies and friends, as well as the numerous bones he has left behind.

As the Yangtze River flows eastward, the waves wash away the heroes; right and wrong, success or failure will all turn into nothing but history. However, just like the sun’s rays gleaming over the towering mountains, after the sunset, a new sun will rise.

title.en: Hazure Zokusei Tsuchi Mahou no Sei de Henkyou ni Tsuihousareta no de, Gangan Ryouchi Kaitakushimasu!

altTitles.ja-ro: Hazure Zokuseido Mahou No Sei De Henkyou Ni Tsuihou Sareta No De, Gangan Ryouchi Kaitaku Shimasu
Hazure Zokuseido Mahō No Sei De Henkyō Ni Tsuihō Saretanode, Gangan Ryōchi Kaitaku Shimasu ！

altTitles.ja: ハズレ属性土魔法のせいで辺境に追放されたので、ガンガン領地開拓します！

altTitles.ja-ro: Hazure Zokusei Tsuchi Mahou no Sei de Henkyou ni Tsuihousareta no de, Gangan Ryouchi Kaitakushimasu!

altTitles.en: I Was Banished to a Desolate Region Because of the Faulty Attribute Earth Magic, so I’m Going to Put in my All to Develop my Territory!

description.en:
Ecto, the third son of the Count Glenreed family, received the skill "Earth Magic" during his coming-of-age ceremony. Earth magic, which is not suitable for combat, is also called the "failure attribute". He was disowned and appointed as the lord of the ultra-remote Boda Village. However, thanks to "a certain secret", Ecto devised a way to use earth magic that ordinary people would not have thought of! Together with his bodyguard female adventurer party "Advancing Wings" and his companions, they defeat magical beasts, clear up forests, cultivate fields... 

Thanks to earth magic, Boda Village undergoes remarkable development!?
description.id:
Ecto, putra ketiga dari keluarga Count Glenreed, menerima keterampilan "Sihir Bumi" selama upacara kedewasaannya. Sihir bumi, yang tidak cocok untuk pertempuran, juga disebut "atribut kegagalan". Dia tidak diakui dan diangkat sebagai penguasa Desa Boda yang sangat terpencil. Namun, berkat "rahasia tertentu", Ecto menemukan cara untuk menggunakan sihir bumi yang tidak akan terpikirkan oleh orang biasa! Bersama dengan rombongan petualang wanita pengawalnya "Advancing Wings" dan teman-temannya, mereka mengalahkan binatang ajaib, membersihkan hutan, mengolah ladang ...
Berkat sihir bumi, Desa Boda mengalami perkembangan yang luar biasa!?
description.ja: グレンリード辺境伯家の三男・エクトは、成人の儀式の際、土魔法のスキルを授かる。戦闘向きでない土魔法はいわゆる「ハズレ属性」。勘当されたうえ、超僻地のボーダ村の領主に任命されてしまう。しかしエクトは「ある秘密」のおかげで普通の人には思いつかないような土魔法の活用法を考案していた！　護衛の女冒険者パーティ「進撃の翼」を始めとした仲間とともに、魔獣を倒し、森を切り拓き、畑を耕し……土魔法のおかげで、ボーダ村はめざましい発展を遂げていく!?

altTitles.en: I Wanted to be Hurt by Love
You Loved Me So Much It Hurt

altTitles.ru: Я хотела бы быть обиженной твоей любовью

altTitles.ja: 君に愛されて痛かった

description.en:
Kanae is a girl who is struggling to fit in with the popular clique at her high school. Because she had been bullied in middle school, she has developed an acute inferiority complex that had led her to engage in questionable after-school activities in order to feel wanted.   
  
In comes Hiroshi, a high-school baseball star who became drawn to her after finding her crying during a group date at a karaoke bar. Thus begins an unhealthy relationship between a mentally unstable high-school girl and a jock.  


---
description.pt: Kanae é uma garota que está lutando pra se encaixar no grupo popular de sua escola. Devido ao bullying que sofreu durante o ensino fundamental, ela desenvolveu um intenso complexo de inferioridade, o que a levou a praticar atividades questionáveis depois das aulas, tudo para sentir-se desejada.

altTitles.ja: 遊☆戯☆王
遊戯王

altTitles.th: เกมกลคนอัจฉริยะ

description.en: Sitting by himself in the back of the class, 10th-grader Yugi always had his head in some game–until he solved the Millennium Puzzle, an Egyptian artifact containing the spirit of a master gambler from the age of the pharaohs! Awakened after three thousand years, the King of Games possesses Yugi, recklessly challenging bullies and evil-doers to the Shadow Games, where the stakes are high, and even the most ordinary bet may result in weirdness and danger beyond belief! Let the games… begin!
description.pt-br: O estudante Yugi Mutou passou a maior parte de seu tempo sozinho jogando jogos - até que ele resolveu o Enigma do Milênio, um artefato egípcio misterioso! Possuída pelo quebra-cabeça, Yugi se torna o Yu-Gi-Oh(O Rei dos Jogos), e irá enfrentar os desafios dos Jogos das Sombras - Jogos mortais com grandes apostas e altos riscos, como apostar a sua alma e a alma de seus queridos amigos! O mangá contém novas histórias não vistas no anime, incluindo a origem de Yugi e seus amigos!

title.en: Kirby of the Stars: Pupupu Hero

altTitles.ja: 星のカービィ プププヒーロー

description.en:
Kirby, the gourmand who will suck up anything, has come to the peaceful land of Pupupu!
"Pleased to eat you! I'm Kirby!"

The slapstick and lively days are about to begin, involving Chilly, who has come to live with Kirby!

altTitles.ja: ヤンデレちゃんこわい

description.en: A Yandere girl obsessed with her childhood friend, how will this story unfold?
description.es-la: Una chica Yandere muy obsesionada con su amigo de la infancia. ¿Como se desenvolverá esta historia?
description.pt-br: Uma garota yandere que é obsecada pelo seu amigo de infância.

altTitles.ja: 神様のオモチャ—THE WORLD—

description.en: 'HP' is commonly used in games to represent the life remaining in certain things, but have you ever wondered what it would be like to see the 'HP' of other things? Huang, able to see the 'HP' of everything in the earth, in his eyes, he sees that the 'HP' of the earth is about to reach zero. Facing this world which is on the verge of death, Huang, with the girl accompanying him, Miu, will they destroy or save the world?

altTitles.ja: 魔法使いのお食事処

description.en:
A novice cook with a thuggish face joins a wizard’s restaurant!
Novice cook Onijima, who was transported to another world after being run over by a truck, ends up working and living in a restaurant run by the strongest wizard in the world.
A fantasy story about working in another world, unfolded with the help of a merry band of demi-human colleagues!

title.en: Saikyou Yuusha Party wa Ai ga Shiritai

altTitles.ja: 最強勇者パーティーは愛が知りたい

altTitles.en: Hero's Party Want to Experience LOVE

altTitles.ja-ro: Saikyō Yūsha Pātī wa Ai ga Shiritai

description.en:
The strong and popular hero won't let me (the unpopular mage) go for some reason!!!
The adventures of the strongest hero's party is full of strange love.

title.en: Rettougan no Tensei Majutsushi - Shiitagerareta Moto Yuusha wa Mirai no Sekai o Yoyuu de Ikinuku (GIGATOON Studio)

altTitles.ja: 劣等眼の転生魔術師 ~虐げられた元勇者は未来の世界を余裕で生き抜く~ (GIGATOON Studio)

altTitles.en: The Reincarnated Magician With Inferior Eyes ~The Oppressed Ex-hero Survives the Future World With Ease~

description.en: In a world where eye color determines one’s magical prowess, there existed a mage of unparalleled might, Abel. Feared even by allies, he transfers his soul to the distant future in search of an ideal realm. Yet, in this new era, his once-celebrated eyes are dubbed “Inferior Eyes” and he becomes the butt of ridicule. Harassed by high-borne nobles and unjustly discriminated against, Abel discovers that while magic has diminished in this technologically advanced future, his Amber Eyes conceal a power beyond human comprehension. This hero from the past is set to revolutionize the magic of the future!

title.en: Heavenly Demon Wants to Be A Chef

description.id:
Woojin menyadari kehidupan masa lalunya melalui insiden Monster Gate.
Dia adalah… Heavenly Demon yang menaklukan Dataran Tengah!
Bahkan ketika dia adalah Heavenly Demon, dia memiliki mimpi yang tidak dapat dia capai…
Dia pasti akan mencapainya kali ini.

Impiannya adalah menjadi chef!

altTitles.ja: 最果てに惑う

description.en: After his little sister was raped and killed herself, a teenage boy took revenge and killed her rapist in return. Seven years later the boy's released from prison, determined to kill himself due to insufferable guilt but then he's confronted by the rapist's daughter. A dramatic tale of guilt and atonement.
description.ru:
«Семь лет назад я убил человека».

Расправившись с преступником, который довёл его сестру, Юри, до самоубийства, Кадзума был приговорён к семи годам тюремного заключения. Даже после выхода на свободу его преследуют мысли о совершённом убийстве и о девочке, наблюдавшей за происходящим. Терзаемый чувством вины, Кадзума принимает решение искупить свои грехи собственной смертью. Вместе со своей матерью он навещает могилу Юри, где замечает знакомое лицо девочки...

Это история о несчастной судьбе дочери преступника-потерпевшего.

title.en: WataMote: No Matter How I Look at It, It's You Guys' Fault I'm Not Popular!

altTitles.en: It's Not My Fault That I'm Not Popular

altTitles.ja: わたモテ
私がモテないのはどう考えてもお前らが悪い!

altTitles.ko: 내가 인기 없는 건 아무리 생각해도 너희들 탓이야!

altTitles.th: สาวมืดมนอลวนหารัก

altTitles.es-la: No importa como lo vea, ¡Es culpa suya que yo no sea popular!

altTitles.ja-ro: Watashi ga Motenai no wa Dou Kangaetemo Omaera ga Warui!

description.en: Kuroki Tomoko is a super popular, high school girl, who has had 50 years of dating experience, and 100 boys… in the Otome game world. In the real world, she is a 15 year old loner, who has all of the qualities of a "mojo." However, when school isn't going as she expected, and she isn't as popular as she had thought she was, she takes a look at herself in the mirror for the first time in a few years, and has some shocking revelations…
description.pl: Główna bohaterka serii – Kuroki Tomoko – jest ultra-popularną uczennicą liceum, która umówiła się już z ponad setką chłopaków… W grach Otome. W realnym świecie jest socjopatką, która zupełnie nie radzi sobie z komunikacją z innymi ludźmi, a w szczególności z płcią przeciwną. Manga opowiada o jej kuriozalnych próbach (z reguły niezbyt udanych) usocjalnienia się i zmienienia się w osobę bardziej popularną.
description.es-la: Kuroki Tomoko, una chica que tiene "50 años de experiencia" en citas y que ha salido con más de un centenar de chicos… en juegos otome. En la vida real acaba de cumplir 15 años y va a dar comienzo su época en el instituto, está convencida de que con sus conocimientos será la más de popular. Una vez comienza el instituto, comienzan a pasar los días y se da cuenta de que no habla con nadie. ¿Cómo es posible? Un simple vistazo al espejo le hace darse cuenta de la realidad: no es precisamente una belleza y parece que hasta puede ser antipática. Poco a poco intentará cambiar para ser popular, pero claro, entre lo que le cuesta y lo que tiene una idea bastante distorsionada de la realidad, no será tan sencillo.

title.en: The Demon King Dad and His Hero Daughter

description.en:
Selene, the daughter who dreams of becoming a hero, and Shion, the demon king who adopted her. Shion has to conceal his true identity at all costs, unable to cheer on his daughter’s dreams or attempt to stop her.
This is the story of Selene’s journey to becoming a true hero amidst this dilemma… Or is it the parenting story of the demon king?!

altTitles.en: Shangri-La Frontier ~From Trash Game Hunter to God-Tier Gamer!~

altTitles.ru: Рубеж Шангри-Ла: любитель игрошлака бросает вызов топ игре

altTitles.ja: シャングリラ・フロンティア　～クソゲーハンター、神ゲーに挑まんとす～

altTitles.zh-hk: 香格里拉・開拓異境～糞作獵手挑戰神作～

altTitles.ja-ro: Shangri-La Frontier ~Kusoge Hunter, Kamige ni Idoman to su~

description.en:
Second-year high school student Rakuro Hizutome loves nothing more than finding so-called “trash games” and beating the crap out of them. When he decides to change things up by playing a new, “god-tier” VR game known as Shangri-La Frontier (aka. SLF), he does what he does best: min-maxes, skips the prologue, and jumps straight into action! Rakuro may be a seasoned gamer, but a meeting with an old rival will change the fate of every SLF player forever.

Clad in nothing but shorts and a bird mask, Rakuro (player name: Sunraku) launches into the world of SLF. Things are going well at first as he takes down a goblin, a bunny, and even a python. But then Sunraku comes up against a huge, hard-hitting wolf known as Lycagon the Nightslayer. Will Sunraku’s years of “trash game” experience be enough, or is he about to suffer a rude awakening just a few hours into his SLF adventure?
description.pt:
A adaptação cômica do romance superpopular de Syosetu Ni Narou.  
  
Hizutome Rakurou adora jogos de merda. Seu próximo desafio é Shangri-la Frontier, o jogo divino com uma base de jogadores total de 30.000.000. Reunindo companheiros (ralé) em um mundo expansivo e encontrando velhos inimigos pelo caminho, ele mudará o destino de cada jogador.
description.ru: Главный герой истории — лидер таблиц рейтинга в посредственных малоизвестных VR-играх (так называемый «игрошлак») которые, тем не менее, полностью его устраивают. Но однажды он решается бросить вызов сверхпопулярной игре с 30 миллионами активных пользователей под названием «Shangri-La Frontier». Адаптация суперпопулярного романа из "Shousetsuka ni Narou".

altTitles.en: Adventurers aim for the strongest in hidden classes

altTitles.ja: 冒険者は隠しクラス〈重力使い〉で最強を目指す

description.en:
A few years back, monsters from different dimensions came to our world, and humans having abilities such as level and skills to fight them emerged. Ikoma, who had acquired the class of “thief” without knowing that he would reach his limits early on, rose to the rank of S-class adventurer. Still, his abilities failed him, and he lost his hope. On the fated day, the city of Ikoma was attacked by a vicious dragon. Ikoma boldly tried to stand up to the dragon, but he was no match for it and was mortally wounded. However, he Miraculously succeeds in stealing a rare item from the dragon that allows him to rewind time using his “thief” skill. Ikoma returns to ten years in the past and uses the knowledge he gained in the first life to acquire the hidden class of “gravity user.

This time I will become… the greatest adventurer!

title.en: Heiwa no Kuni no Shimazaki e

altTitles.ja: 平和の国の島崎へ

altTitles.en: Dear Shimazaki in the Peaceful Land

altTitles.ru: Дорогой Симадзаки, живущий в мирной стране

altTitles.vi: Gửi Shimazaki ở đất nước hòa bình

description.en: As a child, Shimazaki Shingo was kidnapped by an international terrorist organization and raised as their combat agent. After 30 years, he finally made it back to his peaceful hometown in Japan. Will Shimazaki be able to live a peaceful life in this new world?
description.id: Saat masih kecil, Shimazaki Shingo diculik oleh organisasi teroris internasional dan dibesarkan sebagai agen tempur mereka. Setelah 30 tahun berlalu, akhirnya dia berhasil kembali kampung halamannya yang damai di Jepang.
description.ja: 幼少期に国際テロ組織LELに拉致され、戦闘工作員となった男・島崎真悟。30年の時を経て組織からの脱出に成功した彼は、故郷である日本に帰ってくる。島崎は新天地で“平和”な暮らしを手にできるのか－－。

altTitles.ja: クソ女に幸あれ

description.en:
"I've been cheating on you. Oh, and it's not just one guy. It's three. Sorry about that."

Back in middle school, Akiyoshi Sunao's first-ever girlfriend shattered his heart, and he swore off love. However, all that changes when he develops a crush on a girl in his university's film club. Just as he's finally beginning to move on from the past, he bumps into his ex-girlfriend. Little does he know that this is only the beginning...

To his horror, he wakes up in her body the next morning!
description.es-la: "Te he estado engañando. Ah, y no es sólo un chico. Son tres. Lo siento". En la secundaria, la primera novia de Akiyoshi Sunao le destrozó el corazón y renunció al amor. Sin embargo, todo eso cambia cuando se enamora de una chica en el club de cine de su universidad. Justo cuando finalmente comienza a dejar atrás el pasado, se topa con su exnovia. Lo que no sabe es que esto es sólo el comienzo... ¡Para su horror, se despierta en su cuerpo a la mañana siguiente!
description.pt-br: "Eu tenho te traído. Ah, e não é apenas um cara. São três. Desculpe por isso." De volta ao ensino médio, o primeiro amor de Akiyoshi Sunao despedaçou seu coração, e ele jurou evitar o amor. No entanto, tudo muda quando ele se apaixona por uma garota no clube de cinema da universidade. Justo quando ele está começando a superar o passado, ele esbarra com sua ex-namorada. Mal sabe ele que isso é apenas o começo... Para seu horror, ele acorda no corpo dela na manhã seguinte!

altTitles.ja: 波原さんはぶちまけたい！

description.en:
The company she entered was a black IT company... It's such a pain... I want to quit... "Boss, will you please die soon? (Good morning!)"

With a sudden change (?), her honne (inner thoughts) and tatemae (public behavior) switched!? It's always been what she thinks, but, but... As a worker, she can't say it!?  
  
Her hidden "inevitable" honne, becomes a shield against harsh superiors! A pleasant and thrilling comedy!

altTitles.en: The Worthy One to the Heaven

altTitles.es: El Guerrero Digno de los Cielos

description.en: In an age of evil where all humans are being hunted by Spirits, chaos broke out after a Monster destroyed an entire city, thus igniting a battle between gods and demons. But among so much darkness there will always be light, and this will come from the hands of Ding Xiao who will seek to fight against these evil spirits, thus becoming the greatest spiritual master, although the question is: will he be the one to Ascend to touch the sky? Or will he be tempted to turn Evil?
description.es: En una era de maldad donde todos los humanos están siendo cazados por Espíritus, se desató el caos luego de que un Monstruo incitado por la codicia destruyera una ciudad completa, iniciando así una batalla entre dioses y demonios. Pero entre tanta oscuridad siempre habrá luz, y esta vendrá de las manos de Ding Xiao quien buscara luchar contra estos espíritus malignos, convirtiéndose así en el más grande maestro espiritual, aunque la duda es: ¿Él será el indicado para Ascender hasta tocar el cielo o será tentado para volverse Malvado?

altTitles.ja: カオスゲーム

description.en: Ran Suzuki, a self-righteous journalist, receives a tip about a politician who has connections to the underworld. But her knowledge is exposed, and now her life is in danger....... However, "something" even more dangerous than the underworld is lurking out there
description.ja: 正義に燃える週刊誌記者・鈴木蘭は、政治家が裏社会と繋がっているという特ダネを入手する。だが、裏社会の人間に目を付けられてしまい、命の危機に……！しかし、裏社会よりも危険な「何か」が、そこに迫ってきていた。

altTitles.ja: ソードアート・オンライン・ユナイタル・リング

description.en: A year has passed since Kirito and Asuna’s return from the Underworld. With them is Alice, who has been given a physical body. But their peace is quickly broken when the three are suddenly thrust into an unfamiliar game, Unital Ring. This new world is a survival MMO that fuses together every VRMMO created with the Seed program. As soon as it starts, Kirito finds himself with nothing but his underwear. Now, he’s got to challenge a mysterious VRMMOSVG under desperate circumstances!
description.es-la: Ha pasado un año desde el regreso de Kirito y Asuna del Underworld. Con ellos está Alice, que ha recibido un cuerpo físico. Pero su paz se rompe rápidamente cuando los tres se ven empujados de repente a un juego desconocido, Unital Ring. Este nuevo mundo es un MMO de supervivencia que fusiona todos los VRMMO creados con el programa "The Seed". Nada más empezar, Kirito se encuentra sin nada más que su ropa interior. Ahora, ¡Tiene que desafiar a un misterioso VRMMOSVG en circunstancias desesperadas!

altTitles.ja: 税金で買った本

description.en: Ishidaira is a delinquent who visited the library for the first time since elementary school. But then, he was pointed out by Hayasemaru and Shirai, who works at the library, that he has not returned a book that he borrowed ten years ago. A manga about how Ishidaira went from trying to borrow a book from a library to working there instead.
description.pt-br: Ishidaira é um delinquente que visitou a biblioteca pela primeira vez desde o ensino fundamental. Mas então, ele foi apontado por Hayasemaru e Shirai, que trabalha na biblioteca, que ele não devolveu um livro que pegou emprestado dez anos atrás. Um mangá sobre como Ishidaira passou de tentar pegar um livro emprestado de uma biblioteca para trabalhar lá.

title.en: Genshiken Nidaime - The Society for the Study of Modern Visual Culture II

altTitles.ja: げんしけん 二代目

description.en:
Genshiken follows the lives of a group of college students drawn together by their shared hobbies, and the trials and adventures associated with being otaku.  
  
Genshiken Nidaime ("Second Generation") is a continuation of the previous series, with chapter numbering starting at 56.

**Description translated from the author:**
University graduate Mu Siyun sent his resume to the star fleet on a whim and somehow became the Fleet Admiral! This is the story about an admiral with a harem of 3000 female soldiers conquering the universe.

---

**Translator's version:**
The smartest university student to ever graduate from Daxia University's Department of Political History, Mu Siyun, enlists in Beiyang's Fleet on a whim and somehow becomes the Fleet Admiral. Knowing fully well how the world works and how the rich dominate the poor, Mu Siyun seeks to defy the heavens and bring order and hope back to the universe by cleverly scheming against his enemies.
description.ru: По прихоти судьбы выпускник университета Му Сыюнь отправил свое резюме в звёздный флот и каким-то образом стал адмиралом флота! Это история об адмирале с гаремом в 3000 женщин-солдат, покоряющих вселенную…
description.tr: Üniversiteden mezun olan Mu Siyun, bir heves ile öz geçmişini yıldız filosuna yollar ve her nasılsa filo amirali olur! bu hikaye 3000 kız askerin bir filo amiraliyle evreni ele geçirmesini anlatıyor…

altTitles.en: Become a Legend as an All-Rounder

description.en: Kim Tae-seok, who worked on a construction site, receives a notice of passing the document screening for the major company El Sung. At the same time, a message pops up in front of him: 'You have entered the path to becoming a regular employee tutorial. Would you like to proceed?' Follow Kim Tae-seok's struggle to become the legendary all-around employee in this corporate adventure!

altTitles.en: The Thing Which Has Fallen From The Sky

altTitles.ja: そらのおとしもの

description.en: Sakurai Tomoki is a normal student whose motto is "normal is the best". If there is one thing abnormal, it is that he often dreams of a girl whose face he cannot even remember, and when he wakes up from that dream, he would always be crying. He tried leaving it as just a dream… but one day, from the sky, an angel descended.
description.es: Me llamo Tomoki Sakurai. Mi lema es "La paz es lo mejor". ¿No es lo mejor lo normal?　Una de las cosas que no es normal... el sueño que tengo a diario; un sueño sobre una chica cuyo rostro no puedo recordar. Dejé el asunto, pensando que era sólo un sueño... Pero aquel día, un ángel cayó del cielo.
description.ja: 俺の名前は桜井智樹。モットーは「平和が一番」。普通が一番じゃあございませんか？　一つだけ普通じゃないもの…といえば、俺の良く見る夢。顔さえ思い出せない女の子の夢。たかが夢だと放っておいたんだが…。その日、空から、天使が降ってきた。
description.pt-br: Sakurai Tomoki tem tido o mesmo sonho estranho desde que ele era criança e acordava chorando. Sugata, um veterano em sua escola, acredita que o sonho de ser o novo continente. Mais tarde, naquela noite, enquanto espera sob as cerejeiras por Sohara e Sugata, seus amigos de infância, quando algo cai em sua direção e dentro da cratera havia um anjo.

description.en: Lin Tian, a genius game designer, was ordered to be executed because he knew too much of the company secrets. At a critical moment, he was betrayed by his lover Luo Yue and was killed in the jungle. When he woke up, he found he became a low-level monster in the jungle. In order to avenge the past, the male protagonist started on his path as a Monster in The Jungle.
description.fr: Lin Tian, un génie concepteur de jeux, a reçu l'ordre d'être exécuté parce qu'il en savait trop sur les secrets de l'entreprise. À un moment critique, il a été trahi par son amant Luo Yue et tué dans la jungle. Lorsqu'il s'est réveillé, il a découvert qu'il était devenu un monstre de bas niveau dans la jungle. Afin de venger le passé, le protagoniste a commencé son chemin en tant que monstre dans la jungle.

title.en: Reborn as the Heavenly Martial Demon

altTitles.en: After I Die, I Transform Into a Martial Arts Demon
I, In My Posthumous Form, Transform Into The Martial Dao Demon
Reborn as the Heavenly Martial Demon

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ Sǐ Hòu, Huàshēn Wǔdào Tiānmó

description.en:
Humanity lost the war. Businessmen who sold out their fellow compatriots, hunters who turned to the monsters, stepping on countless human corpses, all in order to earn profit. The otherworldly monsters that entered our world seized it bit by bit like a raging fire. That was until Zuo Chi arrived. 
"Back then you all were gladly invading our world, so why are you weeping now?"

title.en: Akuninzura shita B-kyuu Boukensha: Shujinkou to Sono Osananajimi-tachi no Papa ni Naru

altTitles.ja: 悪人面したＢ級冒険者 主人公とその幼馴染たちのパパになる

altTitles.ja-ro: Akunindzura shita B-kyuu Boukensha - Shujinkou to Sono Osananajimi-tachi no Papa ni Naru

altTitles.en: B-Rank Adventurer With an Evil Look Becomes a Daddy to the Protagonist and His Childhood Friends
B-GRADE ADVENTURER WITH A BAD GUY FACE Becomes A Daddy To The Hero And His Fellow Children
A B-Rank Adventurer With an Evil Face Becomes a Father for the Hero and His Childhood Friends

description.en:
Gray, a B-rank adventurer, was supposed to be just a mob character in the RPG "Bright Fantasy." However, by chance, he saved an orphan who was attacked by thugs on the roadside and decided to raise him as his father. But the orphan turned out to be the protagonist of this world, "Isuka"!

This choice would greatly change the fate of the world.
description.pt-br: Gray, um aventureiro de nível B, deveria ser apenas um personagem da máfia no RPG “Bright Fantasy”. Porém, por acaso, ele salvou um órfão que foi atacado por bandidos na beira da estrada e decidiu criá-lo como pai. Mas o órfão acabou por ser o herói deste mundo, “Iska”. Essa escolha mudaria muito o destino do mundo.

description.en: Uho-yeong had dreamed of becoming a soccer player. However, he was not blessed with the talent and died without realizing his dream, struck by lightning. It was then that the demon Mammon appeared, offering the ability to covet everyone's talents...

The apocalypse has dawned upon the world, and food and survival are once again the most important topics of people's concern. Rice and flour have become luxuries, and vegetables are even more expensive! But just then, someone posted a video on a website that shocked the world. Sweet vegetables rolled into a hot pot, emitting a tantalizing green color! A golden leg of lamb is seared in oil! Fish soup simmers as white as milk! The little girl beside me begged: Bro,  I really can't eat anymore!
description.zh: 末日来袭，植物与水源全部枯竭。世界陷入恐慌，食物与生存再次成为人们最关心的话题。米面成为奢侈品，菜蔬更是有价无市！然而就在此时，有人在网站上发送一段视频，令世界震撼。甘甜的菜蔬滚入火锅中，散发诱人的绿色！烤的金黄的羊腿滋滋冒油！鲜美的鱼汤炖的宛若牛奶一般纯白！一旁的小女孩哀求道：哥，我真的吃不下了！

altTitles.ja: ブルーロック

altTitles.th: BLUE LOCK ขังดวลแข้ง

description.de: Nach dem Aus im Achtelfinale bei der WM 2018 ruft der japanische Fußballverband ein Projekt ins Leben, das den ultimativen Stürmer erschaffen und Japan den Weltmeistertitel bringen soll: Blue Lock. Zu diesem Zweck werden die 300 talentiertesten Oberschüler versammelt, darunter auch Yoichi Isagi, ein unbeschriebenes Blatt. Kann er sich gegen die große Konkurrenz durchsetzen und Japans große Hoffnung werden?
description.en:
Yoichi Isagi lost the opportunity to go to the national high school championships because he passed to his teammate who missed instead of shooting himself. Isagi is one of 300 U-18 strikers chosen by Jinpachi Ego, a man who was hired by the Japan Football Association after the 2018 FIFA World Cup, to guide Japan to winning the World Cup by destroying Japanese football. Ego's plan is to isolate the 300 strikers into a prison-like institution called "Blue Lock", in order to create the world's biggest "egotist"/striker, which has been lacking in Japanese football.

---
**Notes:**
- **Won the 45th Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2021**

**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K Manga](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10008/episode/318774) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/blue-lock/)
description.fr:
Isagi Yoichi a perdu l'opportunité d'aller aux championnats nationaux des lycées parce qu'il a passé la balle à son coéquipier qui a raté son but. Isagi est l'un des 300 attaquants U-18 choisis par Ego Jinpachi, un homme qui a été embauché par la Fédération Japonaise de Football après la Coupe du Monde de la FIFA 2018, pour guider le Japon vers la victoire de la Coupe du Monde en détruisant le football japonais. Le plan d'Ego est d'isoler les 300 attaquants dans une institution semblable à une prison appelée "Blue Lock", afin de créer le plus grand "égoïste"/attaquant du monde, ce qui fait défaut dans le football japonais.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Pika**
description.pl:
Piłkarskie battle royale – tak można opisać całą tę historię.  
Z powodu niepowodzeń na mistrzostwach świata, Japoński Związek Piłki Nożnej postanawia wdrożyć program, dzięki któremu uda się stworzyć rewolucyjnego napastnika.  
Yoichi Isagi otrzymuje zaproszenie do wzięcia udziału w tym właśnie programie. Zamknięty w placówce o nazwie Blue Lock, będzie walczył z 299 innymi graczami i starał się zostać najlepszym napastnikiem na świecie.
description.vi: Blue Lock (ブルーロック Burū Rokku) hay Dự án bồi dưỡng cầu thủ đặc biệt là một dự án chuyên đào tạo những tiền đạo trẻ từ khắp nơi trên đất nước Nhật Bản, bao gồm 3 vòng tuyển chọn chính và các vòng phụ. Dự án này có sự tham gia của 300 tiền đạo trẻ và họ sẽ đối đầu trực tiếp với nhau trong các vòng đấu loại trực tiếp.
description.pt-br: Yoichi Isagi perdeu a oportunidade de ir para o campeonato nacional do ensino médio porque ele passou para seu companheiro de equipe que perdeu em vez de chutar para o gol si mesmo. Isagi é um dos 300 atacantes de Sub-18 escolhidos por Jinpachi Ego, contratado pela Associação de Futebol do Japão após a Copa do Mundo de 2018, para guiar o Japão na conquista da Copa do Mundo ao destruir o futebol japonês. O plano de Ego é isolar os 300 atacantes em uma instituição parecida com uma prisão chamada “Blue Lock”, para criar o maior “egoista” / atacante do mundo, que tem faltado no futebol japonês.

title.en: Tsuihou Sareta Tensei Juu Kishi wa Game Chishiki de Musou Suru

altTitles.ja: 追放された転生重騎士はゲーム知識で無双する

altTitles.en: The Exiled Reincarnated Heavy Knight Is Unrivaled in Game Knowledge

description.en:
“You good-for-nothing bastard. You are the son of a Sword Saint, yet you dare pull such a defective Class!?”

During the〈Divine Blessing Ceremony〉of the 15-year-old Elma who came from a lineage of Sword Saints, he had manifested a commonly deemed defective class known as the Heavy Knight. He had been deprived of his position as the next head of the Edvan Household and was then exiled. The Heavy Knight class had an unbalanced status and useless skills, to top it off, it was even said to be a class cowardly and indolent people have.

But, Elma knew better—that this world was the world of the game he had used to play before—and that the Heavy Knight class was the strongest class to exist. Elma made full use of the knowledge he had in his previous life and began his efficient walkthrough of the world he was reincarnated into.
description.ja: 「役立たずめ……剣聖の息子でありながら、こんな大ハズレを引こうとは！」 　十五歳の〈加護の儀〉。剣聖の血筋であるエルマは、典型的なハズレクラスである重騎士を発現し、次期当主の座を奪われて追放されてしまう。重騎士は偏ったステータスに、使い所のないスキル。挙げ句に臆病で怠惰な者が得るクラスだとまでいわれていた。 　だが、エルマは知っていた。この世界は彼が遊び尽くしたゲームの世界であり――重騎士こそが、最強のクラスであることを。エルマは生前の知識をフル活用し、この世界の効率的な攻略を始めるのだった。

title.en: HUNTER x HUNTER - DIGITAL COLORED COMICS

altTitles.en: Hunter x Hunter - Digital Colored Comics

altTitles.ja: ハンター×ハンター

description.en: Hunters are a special breed, dedicated to tracking down treasures, magical beasts, and even other men. But such pursuits require a license, and less than one in a hundred thousand can pass the grueling qualification exam. Those who do pass gain access to restricted areas, amazing stores of information, and the right to call themselves Hunters.
description.pt-br: Versão totalmente colorida do famoso mangá "Hunter x Hunter". Hunters são uma raça especial, dedicada a rastrear tesouros, animais mágicos, e até mesmo outros homens. Mas tais atividades requerem uma licença, e menos de um em cem mil pode passar no exame de qualificação esgotante. Aqueles que não passam tem acesso a áreas restritas, lojas de incríveis informações, bem como o direito de chamar-se de Hunters.

description.en: Higan:Eruthyll: On the Eruthyll planet, humans obtained unique crystal veins called Dubriostal, based on which they developed brilliant magic tech. Feeling blessed by Dubriostal, people start to worship and deify Dubriostal, thus resulting in the emergence of Crystalis Conflux. Steeped in Crystalis Conflux's propaganda, people discriminate against those who cannot resonate with the Dubriostal, branding them as Castaway and claiming their souls are incomplete. Crystalis Conflux secretly devised an evil plan; only Castaways can see through their lies. To fight against the Crystalis Conflux and save the world, Castaways formed their resistance group - Gopher Troupe. This manga elaborates on the founding of Gopher Troupe and Castaways' glorious path of struggle.

In the era of astral pets, only the might of pets was essential! However, making the pets stronger has always been a slow and arduous process for pet warriors. That was until the appearance of a mysterious pet shop that changed everything!

The weakest skeleton could slay a great golden dragon with a single strike after training at this pet shop! Even the humble watchdog of the shop possessed ten legendary skills, and the female worker in the shop claimed to be a Goddess...

As for what the shopkeeper Su Ping thinks: I'm merely training these cute pets to become exceptional overlord beasts. What? Is it not normal?
- - -
In the era of beasts, pet strength determines everything! The battle pet master works hard and slowly to improve the strength of the pet. Until a mysterious pet store came out of nowhere!

In just a few days of cultivation, the lowly skeleton can kill the golden dragon with a single slash. Does the guard dog have ten secret skills of pet beats? The working girl even calls herself a god...

As for the owner, Su Ping: Isn't it a regular practice to breed cute pets into prehistoric king beasts?

title.en: Counterattacking System Available At The Grand Ascension Stage

altTitles.zh: Dacheng Qi Cai You Ni Xi Xitong

altTitles.en: Only in the Mahayana Period Does the Counterattack System Exist

description.en: Jiang Li, after crossing over, discovered he possessed no cheat abilities so he had no choice but to diligently cultivate. Five hundred years later, he became the strongest in the Nine Provinces. Suddenly, a system appeared, claiming it could help the host go from the Qi Refining stage to becoming the number one in the Nine Provinces. Jiang Li stared at the first task, lost in thought. “Host, please defeat your cousin (at the sixth level of Qi Refining).” “Your system seems to have quite a delay, doesn’t it?”

title.en: Gambling Outcast Kaiji: The Kazuya Arc - Kaiji Part 4

altTitles.ja: 賭博堕天録 カイジ 和也編

description.en: Kaiji wins the anomalous two-player mahjong game "17 Steps" against the villainous president Muraoka, and gains a huge sum of 480 million yen! While the aftermath of that game is still fresh on everyone's minds, Kazuya, the son of Hyoudou Kazutaka, the chairman of the Teiai Group, offers him another game!

Han Tae-Sung thought he was talented in video games and dreamt of turning his life around through BNW. But he would soon realize that life was not as easy as he thought it was.

He’s betrayed by his comrades, hunted down by his enemies, and even chased by debts in real life. He lost everything in the blink of an eye and was thrown down a pit of despair.

What stood in his way? Talent, wealth, connections, and luck.

There was simply no way he could win against those born differently no matter how much he struggled.

However, armed with a second chance and a hidden class, Tae-Sung starts from scratch and embarks on a journey to redeem himself and exact revenge against his enemies.

altTitles.ja: 今日から始める幼なじみ

altTitles.en: Starting Today She's My Childhood Friend

altTitles.ja: 今日おさ

description.en:
Kaede Yuzuki is Kouhei Aida's new neighbor, both at home and in the classroom. Kouhei tries to be friendly with Kaede, but their conversations lead nowhere. But then one day…
___
[Official X Account](https://twitter.com/kyo_osa0420)

altTitles.ja: 桃源暗鬼

description.en: Ichinose Shiki, an inheritor of the blood of Oni had lived out his entire childhood oblivious to this fact. However, when an unknown man comes rushing into his home in attempts to assassinate him, his foster father finally reveals the truth. In a world where Oni and Momotarou have never been able to coexist, join Ichinose in his struggle for power and unifying the two races!
